players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "Charlie was the mafioso, I found out through investigation. Trust me."
Bob: "I have no information to share at this time, but I urge everyone to be cautious and consider the implications of Diana's sudden revelation."
Bob: "I believe it is important for us to stay focused and not jump to conclusions based on one piece of information. Let's work together to gather more evidence before making any accusations."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Bob
